title: LISTEN: The Debate - Paul Merson and Ray Parlour
description: Listen to the latest edition of The Debate as Paul Merson and Ray Parlour joined Geoff Shreeves to discuss all the big talking points.
content: The former Arsenal duo analysed all the latest transfer news, including Henrikh Mkhitaryan's potential move to the Emirates and why Olivier Giroud would be a perfect signing for Chelsea.There was also talk about the battle for the top four in the Premier League, the futures of Daniel Sturridge and Jack Rodwell, as well as mental health in football.All that and more in the latest The Debate podcast.Listen to The Debate and subscribe to more podcasts via iTunes
